api_list.name: Get the total number of curiosity
api_list.description: Returns the count. The total number of curiosities available, so that you can move with your offset from 0 to count - 1.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://curiosity2.p.rapidapi.com/count_posts"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "curiosity2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get a curiosity
api_list.description: Retrieves a curiosity about science, history, or something else. Please remember currently it is *Italian only*.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://curiosity2.p.rapidapi.com/get_post"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "curiosity2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

import requests
